column4: Hey I was helping my friend Joe84 with that driver problem and after he installed it we tried restarting the machine and he got a bunch of errors and a recommendation to use fsck. Tried that... didn't work... any suggestions?
boot to livecd to use better fsck options
so we have the livecd running. What fsck options should we use... I've never used it before.
funny thing is that the restricted drivers are available from the livecd. But in the installed version there are no drivers in the list.
